description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1a2fh","text":"The here described medium can be used to image yeast without immobilization or compression while allowing for growth in all directions. The medium constists of YPD with agar added at a very low concentration to form a soft gel that allows for free growth in all directions. The media can be poured into any multiwell plate or dish to be imaged with an inverted microscope. This protocol is written for 1l of final medium but smaller quanities can be used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"d3k99","text":"This is an unverified and experimental protocol. Use this protocol at your own risk, use this for informational purposes only.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"dko9g","text":"When transfering the warm media to the final container, allow for enough height to image and for innoculation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71m13","text":"The final product is fragile and should not be tilted, shaken or inverted.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8oiev","text":"To an autoclavable bottle add per 1l:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bodre","text":"  Yeast extract","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"73ikf","text":"  Peptone","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dneui","text":"  Agar","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"akirb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21qcj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tho5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"6C94D7B086B111ECBA47EF0B4A5105EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"7590CCC086B111ECBA47EF0B4A5105EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"8039606086B111ECBA47EF0B4A5105EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bv9v","text":"Invert the bottle to dissolve everything apart from the agar","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6eq1h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8p8gm","text":"Autoclave or heat up sufficiently to dissolve the agar and insure sterility","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fq62h","text":"Per 1l add   of sterile  40% glucose and mix, avoid introducing air bubbles","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3d47c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"BC6A76F086B111ECBA47EF0B4A5105EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qvc","text":"Let the solution cool down so that it can be safely handled and pour or pipette into the final container in which the imaging will take place. Avoid air bubbles as they can interfere with imaging. Make sure to avoid contamination by working near a bunsen burner or in a laminar flow hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cff7e","text":"Wait for the agar solidify over night before innoculating the media. This media takes significantly longer to set, allow for multiple hours before any change in consistancy is noticible, be aware that the final product is very soft and can easily be mistaken for liquid media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b77hm","text":"Add   of water of appropriate quality per 1l of final media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6gjim","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"950","error":false,"guid":"893F121086B411ECBA47EF0B4A5105EB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

title: Soft agar for yeast imaging
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"c0du2","text":"Wear standard PPE for the biosafety level of the laboratory where this protocol is performed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7l3s7","text":"The contents of the flask can remain dangerously hot for a long time after autoclaving. Always follow the instructions of your autoclave, tightening bottles can be dangerous due to the pressure differences involved.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4iemf","text":"When autoclaving or heating, only fill bottles to half their volume to avoid foaming, splashing and spills.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eciv9","text":"Read the SDS of all materials involved before following the protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
